entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in the Natuashish area.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
